plot outline: "Jatt Airways" is a story of two brothers who want to get married to two sisters. Due to some misunderstanding between girls and boys they start hating each other. The movie has a lot of funny events which take place along with romance, high comedy, drama and murder mystery. Surprising Twists, Fight between police and villain and appearance of a wandering soul too give a different angle in the story. The wandering soul makes everyone's life like a hell. Lets see what happens to that wandering soul, who all come out of murder mystery and whether the boys and girls get married as per their wish or not. Complete story moves along with high comedy and drama.
title: Jatt Airways
